file_content.text: Equip: Ship toughness is set to <<1>>.
Equip: Ship blasters fire <<1>> shots per second.
Equip: Ship blasters deliver <<1>> damage per bolt.
Equip: Ship has shields that absorb <<1>> damage.
Equip: Ship shields regenerate <<1>> toughness per second.
Equip: Ship missile bay now holds <<1>> missiles.
Equip: Ship now holds <<1>> proton torpedoes. Use: Right-click and hold reticle over target until target-lock, then release.
Use: Blast cannons deal more damage, but shield regeneration is cut in half.
Use: Shield regeneration is boosted significantly, but blast cannons deal very little damage.
Use: Deliver a large amount of damage to nearby enemies and allies.
Use: Enemies cannot target you for 10 seconds.
Use: Deliver a massive amount of damage to nearby enemies and allies. The blast will remove all shields.
Use: Enemies cannot target you for 15 seconds.
Equip: Increases ship toughness by <<1>>.
Equip: Increases blaster shots per second by <<1>>.
Equip: Increases blaster damage per bolt by <<1>>.
Equip: Increases shield absorption by <<1>>.
Equip: Increases shield regeneration by <<1>>.
Equip: Increases missile bay capacity by <<1>>.
Equip: Increases missile damage to 500.
